channel.title: Dumping and ripping?
channel.description:
ok, im trying to load a 601 on a 317 for it's animations, and i'll have to dump 601 info and rip the 601 loaders.
I was just wondering if someone would spare some time of telling me how to do that?

item.title: Dumping and ripping?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“mongoth666, post:9, topic:351668”][quote author=Infinity Zr link=topic=448021.msg3288333#msg3288333 date=1280361550]

Well, the ass holes on R-S know how, but they’re to lazy and selfish to spare a few minutes of their time to tell me

And that ass hole is SWAT and if it wasent for him we wouldent have half of the animations we have now just becuase no ones tells you how to do it you cry?

this is rare also only so many no how to do this
[/quote]

I don’t only need animations, i need the correct NPC models, a 603 kojack, current models which i am not making 60,000 fking ints and fiddlefarting with the zoom and offset options all damn day, and i do know someone who knows how, but they’re a selfish 12 year old.

AND

Don’t go around expected everyone to know god damn EVERYTHING, it’s that stupid bullshit that everyone thinks that everyone knows everything they know. THATS JUST FKING STUPID.

Well, the ass holes on R-S know how, but they’re to lazy and selfish to spare a few minutes of their time to tell me

Why would they want to waste their time to help someone, when all proper documentation is out there?

Wtf are you talking about… look yourself, there is nothing on how to do this.[/quote]

Maybe you should stop wasting your time replying and crying about it and get to work.

Read full topic

Ask Pali he will definitely give it to you no doubt

item.title: Dumping and ripping?
item.dc:creator: @mongoth666 mongoth666
item.description:
@mongoth666 wrote:

badger41:

@ above post, you say they are acting like a 12 year old, yet in one of your sentences youre acting quite immature.

I’m pretty frustrated. I ask this guy if he can show me, and he says he only uses his time to himself, quite selfish imo.

Read full topic

item.title: Dumping and ripping?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

mongoth666:

Wtf are you talking about… look yourself, there is nothing on how to do this.

I never once said there is a “tutorial” on how to do this. I said there all the proper documentation is out there for you to use. You can easily figure out how with days of research and study.

Read full topic

item.title: Dumping and ripping?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, I’d imagine you do it like you would any other way. I haven’t been able to find out squat in anything after 377, but just save data to a file when it’s loaded (And you’re playing a server, unless the animations are all loaded and unpacked on startup). Though, probably much easier said than done

Read full topic
